content: Requesting advice on a simpNF linter suggestion on #24538. Specifically, I have lemmas convertingHEq (homOfEq f _ _) g into HEq f g, even in cases where the alternative of converting into homOfEq f _ _ = g is type-correct, on the principle that the former makes progress and the latter does not. Certainly that was true in my original use case.
Is this assumption justified, can I just silence the linter here and be done with it?
Can you just change the lemma to homOfEq f _ _ = g <-> Heq f g?
